Introduction

Hamada Asahi, also known by his stage name Asahi is a Japanese singer under YG Entertainment. He is a member of the boy group TREASURE.

He competed in YG's survival show YG Treasure Box where he qualified as a member of Magnum, the second debuting group from the show, but the plans were changed and instead of debuting two groups, YG Entertainment decided to debut all of the members in the group TREASURE.

Asahi debuted as a member of TREASURE on August 7, 2020 with the single album, The First Step: Chapter One.

Fun facts

1
Whenever Asahi talks, the members will clap their hands because it is so hard for him to say anything infront of the camera. Asahi loves to keep quiet down but not behind the camera.
…
2
Asahi’s motto is “Good attitude, good mood, good music.”
…
3
He was a quiet and shy guy but not around the members.
…
4
Asahi’s hobbies are composing, soccer, and drawing.
…
5
He taught himself how to self-compose when he was in middle school.
…
6
Asahi can continuously kick a soccer ball, his highest record is 1000.
…
7
Asahi performed “Lay Me Down” for his introduction video.
…
8
His three phrases are “Music is Everything”, “R&B”, and “Sweat Robot.”
…
9
Things that must be in Asahi's bag are his cellphone & earphone.
…
10
He was the last member to be announced for Magnum.
